participants.name: Jeremy Pond
participants.description: Accountant/Cash Manager at VION Receivable Investments

messages.message: Hey Brian, its been a long time. How have you been?

Brian
Awesome! Living in Phoenix. Writing code for studysauce.com. Married to polish royalty  with two dogs a bird and a gold fish. We just picked up a free hot tub that I am doing some fiberglass repair on. There is my 30 seconds update. What have you been up to?
Doing accounting for a company that buys accounts receivable. Married as well with two kids. Trying to squeeze in some time to code whenever possible.  timeandeffort.com is my latest project.
